metadata.title: CVE-2017-12938 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
UnRAR before 5.5.7 allows remote attackers to bypass a directory-traversalprotection mechanism via vectors involving a symlink to the . directory, asymlink to the .. directory, and a regular file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12938` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

unrar - 1:5.5.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unrar-nonfree package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:5.5.8-1').
